data.title: No Hogansville at all.....Troup County
data.meta_description: I have been receiving Hogansville via Troup county for years. Now It is downloaded from RR and list the codes but when uploaded it never picks Hogansville...
data.text:
I have been receiving Hogansville via Troup county for years. Now It is downloaded from RR and list the codes but when uploaded it never picks Hogansville up at all. I live only 2 miles from Hogansville. Please let me know if anyone knows a fix for this......Thanks in advance MC

Hard to recommend a fix without knowing what make & model scanner(s) you are using and what software app(s) you used to program. My crystal ball's on backorder I was able to gather this:

Troup County Public Safety P25 Trunking System, Various, Georgia

Troup County Public Safety P25 Trunking System Profile

Hogansville​

DECHEXModeAlpha TagDescriptionTag1140474DHPD DISPPolice - DispatchLaw Dispatch1141475DHPD INVPolice - InvestigationsLaw Tac1142476DHPD SP EVENTPolice - Special EventsLaw Tac1143477DHPS DISPPublic Services - DispatchPublic Works1144478DHOGAN COMMONCitywide - CommonInterop

Hard to recommend a fix without knowing what make & model scanner(s) you are using and what software app(s) you used to program. My crystal ball's on backorder I was able to gather this:

Troup County Public Safety P25 Trunking System, Various, Georgia

Troup County Public Safety P25 Trunking System Profile

Hogansville​

DECHEXModeAlpha TagDescriptionTag1140474DHPD DISPPolice - DispatchLaw Dispatch1141475DHPD INVPolice - InvestigationsLaw Tac1142476DHPD SP EVENTPolice - Special EventsLaw Tac1143477DHPS DISPPublic Services - DispatchPublic Works1144478DHOGAN COMMONCitywide - CommonInterop

I have been receiving Hogansville via Troup county for years. Now It is downloaded from RR and list the codes but when uploaded it never picks Hogansville up at all. I live only 2 miles from Hogansville. Please let me know if anyone knows a fix for this......Thanks in advance MC

Do you have all of the trunk frequencies for the Hogansville site programmed into the scanner?? Do you have the scanner set to P-25 Auto? Makes a difference on how it receives the site/sites.

The LaGrange/Troup County Trunked System appears to have made some recent changes or updates that are not listed in RR yet.

It looks like a New Trunked License was approved around Oct. 2023.

Some New Sites appear to have been added.

Some New Frequencies appears to have been added.

Unsure if the current Sites or Freq.s listed in RR are still active or not or if they have been changed over to the New Simulcast System?

Try these Freq.s out under a Simulcast Site and see if they work.

Lagrange, GA

Call Sign: WRZD433

https://wireless2.fcc.gov/UlsApp/UlsSearch/license.jsp?licKey=4831288

4 New Simulcast Sites:

Unknown Site #?

52 Hightower Rd.

Hogansville, GA, Troup County

--

583 Oak Grove Road

Pine Mountain, GA, Troup County

--

5605 Roanoke Road

LaGrange, GA, Troup County

--

Robertson Street @ SH109

LaGrange, GA, Troup County

Simulcast Frequencies:

854.0625

854.6625

855.2125

855.8625

856.1125

856.5375

856.6875

857.0625

Emission Designator:

9K80D7W, P25 Phase II, TDMA

I don't think the new system is live, but maybe it is? It was just ordered recently (October?). I do know for a fact that it will be encrypted, so not happy about that at all. If I remember, I'll ask my source about the Troup system tomorrow. I should be seeing them tomorrow evening for an unrelated matter.

Okay, I did get to discuss the Troup system with my source this evening. Here is the scoop. The new system has been ordered and some new towers are supposed to be built as part of the project. Nothing new is on the air, or even close to it. The old system is still valid. This week the Hogansville site lost power, so that may be why you didn't hear traffic. Apparently there is no UPS and no site generator at that site, so if the power is out then it is down, but that should be a rare and brief event. If you are not hearing traffic right now, then something is wrong with your setup. Oh, also in regard to encryption, apparently that is not a done deal so there may be some hope yet. Hopefully the powers that be will elect to not encrypt all public safety traffic.
